title: Stuck in Fountain? Bug? Glitch?
body:
So, sometimes when I connect to a game I am stuck in Fountain by some kind of "Invisible wall".
I can flash over it, but then there's a second "invisible wall".
I can teleport to a tower, but then there's a circular "invisible wall" around the tower i teleported too.
Everyone else can leave to their lanes normally but I'm blocked by that wall.
It mainly happens on taliyah, but also happened on camille today.

I usually leave the game in that case so that they can surrender without loosing LP. but now I got low priority queue for 5 games, which i haven't gotten since about 1 and a half years, and this is kind of pissing me off, given that this is not my fault.
Never had problems with my internet speed in anything. Coputer is virus free. All backgroundtasks are closed when i play league. I tried redownlaoding league, but nope, stil not fixed. And pc specks are way above what is needed to play League.

So if anyone knows what this is, why this is happening or how to fix it, please tell me, cause it's really annoying.

replies.body: You could be having a connection problem that's failing to communicate your actions to the game server, so you're kind of just stuck there.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview, as I'm guessing it could be packet loss.  If that's the case, go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix it up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
